    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1041</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Today's Horoscope and the Newspaper</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Heutiges Horoskop und die Zeitung</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Horoscope d'aujourd'hui et le journal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Horoscope de hoje e o jornal</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Odierno horoscope ed il giornale</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημερινό ωροσκόπιο και η εφημερίδα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Horoscope de hoy y el periódico</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">See if the horoscope columns in different newspapers are similar or different.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Horoscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">believe</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">lesson plan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">zodiac sign</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Sehen Sie, wenn die Horoskopspalten in den 
unterschiedlichen Zeitungen ähnlich oder unterschiedlich sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Voyez si les colonnes de horoscope dans 
différents journaux sont semblables ou différentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Veja se as colunas do horoscope em jornais 
diferentes forem similares ou diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Veda se le colonne di horoscope in giornali 
differenti sono simili o differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Δείτε εάν οι στήλες ωροσκοπίων στις 
διαφορετικές εφημερίδες είναι παρόμοιες ή διαφορετικές.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Vea si las columnas del horoscope en diversos 
periódicos son similares o diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Horoskop</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">glauben Sie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lektionplan</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Tierkreiszeichen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Horoscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">croyez</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Horoscope</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">acredite</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">planta da lição</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">sinal do zodiac</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Horoscope</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
